content.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor.csv',
        Data_Source='nyc_green_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS vendor;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''vendor.csv'',
        Data_Source=''nyc_green_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS vendor';
